values:
This is the journal of Kira Izuru, [Volume 9].

I have just closed out my previous journal [final page count 214] and pulled this one from the shelf.  [A gift from Hinamori-kun for my birthday this past year, I thought the crane pattern was very nice. 320 pages, incidentally!]  

Currently I am serving as the Vice Captain of the 3rd Division, under Captain Ichimaru Gin as I have been since page 494 of Journal Vol. 7.

I am still keeping company with Abarai Rejji [he's violent and uncouth but a good person at heart, see Volumes 4-8, red tabs] and Hinamori Momo [she is truly a wonderful and amazing person! Volumes 4-8 purple tabs].

I shall write more when I have time.

~Kira Izuru
